name: Starship Entropy
description:
Aboard the malfunctioning Starship Entropy, numerous components are short circuiting and slowly destroying the ship! It's up to you to fix them and keep the ship together long enough for it to reach its destination!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Shift to sprint
  • Left click to interact with components
  • Right click to bring up the ship map

GAMEPLAY TIPS:

  • Each broken component contributes to the bar at the top of the screen. When the Death Bar fills up, the ship explodes
  • Each components icon on the map turns more red the longer it's been broken
  • Fixing a component removes all damage it has contributed to the Death Bar
  • The keypad in the top-right section requires a code that must be acquired from the robot who patrols the ship (click on him to get it)
  • The bar below the death bar shows how close the ship is to its destination. If it reaches it without exploding, you win!

Textures created by my friend Daniel

Music created by MusicByPedro on YouTube
